alert.note: Alert for Spencer; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 3:50PM EDT until July 02 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN WARRICK...EAST CENTRAL VANDERBURGH...SOUTHWESTERN SPENCER AND NORTHEASTERN HENDERSON COUNTIES... At 250 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Newburgh, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. 60 mph wind gusts were reported in Evansville at 245 pm. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Evansville, Henderson, Boonville, Newburgh, Chandler, Rockport, Melody Hill, Eureka and Tennyson. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 1 and 13. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
